name: Space Jam (itch) (frogger35, Sno0pyP)
description:
Space Jam! You know it! You love it! This game is nothing like the movie though!

In Space Jam you will save earth by firing your massive earth rockets at incoming asteroids!

Be careful though your rocket might get sucked in by a nearby planet!!

Asteroids do get attracted to earths gravity so keep your eyes peeled!

Game brought to you by: Sno0pyp and Frogger35

Comment your score and or time survived below :D!

Controls:

A or left arrow or mouse to the left - rotate left

D or right arrow or mouse to the right - rotate right

W or Space bar or up arrow or mouse left click - fire one rocket

Hold shift to rotate faster (doesn't work when using the mouse sorry!!)

Escape - Pause game menu

To play the game:

  • Download the correct version for your OS
  • Unzip the folder
  • Play the game

This list probably is right but We've only tried windows!

Credits:

Music

Thanks for playing our game! Please let us know what you think in the comments!
